title: Textile, 1960-79-37, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chitnz) on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 63.5 x 31 cm (25 x 12 3/16 in.)
H x W: 160 x 78 cm (5 ft. 3 in. x 30 11/16 in.)
description: Chintz, 31" wide, with brilliant blue ground, roller printed in coarse Chinoiserie design in red, yellow, blue, black, brown and green. Two groups of Chinese figures in staggered repeat.
